title: Spack finds wrong arch on Cori at NERSC

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I am attempting to use spack VOTD (SHA f4e77867) to install various TPLs required by the low Mach CFD code Nalu-Wind on the Cori supercomputer @ NERSC.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
> git clone https://github.com/LLNL/spack.git
> source ./spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
> spack arch
cray-cnl6-haswell
> spack install cmake
```
### Error Message
```
==> Error: No compilers found for operating system cnl6 and target haswell.
If previous installations have succeeded, the operating system may have been updated.
Compilers are defined for the following operating systems and targets:
	sles12-x86_64
	cnl9-any
Run 'spack compiler find' to add compilers.
```

If I checkout out a release version of spack, the command works as expected:
```
> cd spack
> git checkout --track origin/releases/v0.12
Branch releases/v0.12 set up to track remote branch releases/v0.12 from origin.
Switched to a new branch 'releases/v0.12'
> source ./spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
> spack -v arch
cray-cnl9-haswell
> spack install cmake
==> ncurses@6.0 : externally installed in /usr
==> ncurses@6.0 : generating module file
==> ncurses@6.0 : registering into DB
==> openssl@1.1.0 : has external module in openssl/1.1.0a
==> openssl@1.1.0 : is actually installed in /global/common/cori/software/openssl/1.1.0a/hsw
==> openssl@1.1.0 : generating module file
==> openssl@1.1.0 : registering into DB
==> Installing cmake
==> Searching for binary cache of cmake
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for cmake found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://cmake.org/files/v3.12/cmake-3.12.3.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
[snip]
```
### Information on your system

Cray XC40 (Cori @ NERSC)
default modules loaded:
```
  1) modules/3.2.10.6                                  9) pmi/5.0.14                                       17) atp/2.1.3
  2) nsg/1.2.0                                        10) dmapp/7.1.1-6.0.7.1_5.45__g5a674e0.ari           18) PrgEnv-intel/6.0.4
  3) intel/18.0.1.163                                 11) gni-headers/5.0.12.0-6.0.7.1_3.11__g3b1768f.ari  19) craype-haswell
  4) craype-network-aries                             12) xpmem/2.2.15-6.0.7.1_5.11__g7549d06.ari          20) cray-mpich/7.7.3
  5) craype/2.5.15                                    13) job/2.2.3-6.0.7.1_5.43__g6c4e934.ari             21) gcc/7.3.0
  6) cray-libsci/18.07.1                              14) dvs/2.7_2.2.118-6.0.7.1_10.2__g58b37a2           22) altd/2.0
  7) udreg/2.3.2-6.0.7.1_5.13__g5196236.ari           15) alps/6.6.43-6.0.7.1_5.45__ga796da32.ari          23) darshan/3.1.4
  8) ugni/6.0.14.0-6.0.7.1_3.13__gea11d3d.ari         16) rca/2.2.18-6.0.7.1_5.47__g2aa4f39.ari
```

@sayerhs
